lines.text: Can you imagine a better place for a popcorn stand?
DON'T BURN THE CHATEAU! DON'T BURN THE CHATEAU! DON'T BURN THE CHATEAU!

[with a megaphone]
Can you hear me? Do you...?
DON'T BURN THE CHATEAU! DON'T BURN THE CHATEAU!
Stop this! Disperse! The decision has been made in democratic order.
We'll take a vote. Shall we disperse?
We'll stay! The decision has been made in democratic order.
What are you gonna do with tons of apples? They can't be sold! Ask any applefarmer! They just pile up and rot!
